response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This unique item, tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations, is priced at $1,200,000. I believe this offers a fair compromise between its intrinsic worth of $1,500,000 and my valuation of $800,000, allowing us both to benefit from this transaction. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually satisfactory agreement.", "product_price": 1200000}
